A88ECE41AB094F43BEE7E315F81FD73D.description: Researching the benefits and impacts of charitable giving on society and the giver.

3E8E126550D6467FB38EBAB68D3B10F7.description:

E207F68E06E34BA0AC3A5D09FC717F53.description:

97A15D3980804B3AB4A21E941B543E1D.description:

17C143E6B03646DDA56BCEE62FCFAECD.description: Analyzing advertising examples in order to identify the misuse of information and fine-print details used to impact consumer decisions.

BC27BE4BB12549BC897EA03608809D4E.description:

0FF3708260804DEE95920106E31ED3B7.description:

08067E31781244C6B8C9210364BCB0AE.description:

Demonstrating an understanding of the importance of controlling personal information to
